long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing mark•r, the revolutionary AI Conversational Assistant browser plugin that is changing the game in web browsing!

mark•r allows users to effortlessly highlight text on any web page, activating a dynamic icon complete with a text field for conversational queries. Powered by cutting-edge AI, mark•r doesn’t just focus on the highlighted text, it dives deep into the entire context of the webpage to curate and generate insightful, precise responses tailored to your queries.
Whether you’re looking to delve deeper into a topic, seek clarifications, or discover additional information, mark•r is designed to understand your needs and respond in real-time.
Transform your browsing experience from passive reading to active engagement. Question, learn, and explore the internet like never before with mark•r, the future of interactive web browsing at your fingertips.
